quotes.text: Change is the law of life. And those who look only to the past or present are certain to miss the future.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: Be the change that you want to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: To exist is to change, to change is to mature, to mature is to go on creating oneself endlessly.
quotes.author: Henri Bergson

quotes.text: You cannot change anything in your life with intention alone, which can become a watered-down, occasional hope that you'll get to tomorrow. Intention without action is useless.
quotes.author: Caroline Myss

quotes.text: If you want your life to be more rewarding, you have to change the way you think.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: Ethics change with technology.
quotes.author: Larry Niven

quotes.text: You are always free to change your mind and choose a different future, or a different past.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.text: The pessimist complains about the wind; the optimist expects it to change; the realist adjusts the sails.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.text: What we think determines what happens to us, so if we want to change our lives, we need to stretch our minds.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.text: I don't need a friend who changes when I change and who nods when I nod; my shadow does that much better.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.text: If you don't like something change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude about it. Don't complain.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Don't change your mind just because people are offended; change your mind if you're wrong.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.text: Nothing endures but change.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.text: We don't stop playing because we grow old; we grow old because we stop playing.
quotes.author: Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: We do not quit playing because we grow old, we grow old because we quit playing.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Jr.

quotes.text: Don't smother each other. No one can grow in the shade.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.text: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
quotes.author: E. E. Cummings

quotes.text: Good timber does not grow with ease; the stronger the wind, the stronger the trees.
quotes.author: J. Willard Marriott

quotes.text: No person is your friend who demands your silence or denies your right to grow.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.text: You can only grow if you're willing to feel awkward and uncomfortable when you try something new.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: People grow through experience if they meet life honestly and courageously. This is how character is built.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Every friendship goes through ups and downs. Dysfunctional patterns set in; external situations cause internal friction; you grow apart and then bounce back together.
quotes.author: Mariella Frostrup

quotes.text: If facts are the seeds that later produce knowledge and wisdom, then the emotions and the impressions of the senses are the fertile soil in which the seeds must grow.
quotes.author: Rachel Carson
